snippet: The company is among a few that hope to stimulate conversation on social-media outlets like Facebook, Twitter and YouTube before the big game.
abstract: The company is among a few that hope to stimulate conversation on social-media outlets like Facebook, Twitter and YouTube before the big game.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen of America has released a video clip previewing its 2012 Beetle commercial that will run during Super Bowl XLVI on Sunday.

headline.main: A Favorite Last Year, Volkswagen Releases Its Super Bowl Ad Early
